trans-unit.source: Provides constants and static methods for trigonometric, logarithmic, and other common mathematical functions.
trans-unit.target: 提供三角函數、對數函數和其他一般數學函數的常數和靜態方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses several mathematical and trigonometric functions from the <xref:System.Math> class to calculate the inner angles of a trapezoid.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用數個數學和三角函數函式，從<xref:System.Math>類別計算 trapezoid 內部角度。

trans-unit.source: Returns the absolute value of a specified number.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定數字的絕對值。

trans-unit.source: A number that is greater than or equal to <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MinValue" />, but less than or equal to <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 大於或等於 <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MinValue" />但小於或等於 <see cref="F:System.Decimal.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: Returns the absolute value of a <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> number.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 數字的絕對值。

trans-unit.source: A decimal number, x, such that 0 ≤ x ≤<see cref="F:System.Decimal.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 十進位數字 x，其滿足下列條件 0 ≤ x ≤<see cref="F:System.Decimal.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The absolute value of a <xref:System.Decimal> is its numeric value without its sign.
trans-unit.target: 數值的絕對值<xref:System.Decimal>是沒有正負號的數值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the absolute value of both 1.2 and -1.2 is 1.2.
trans-unit.target: 例如，1.2 和字-1.2 的絕對值是 1.2。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Math.Abs%28System.Decimal%29> method to get the absolute value of a number of <xref:System.Decimal> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Math.Abs%28System.Decimal%29>方法來取得的數字的絕對值<xref:System.Decimal>值。

trans-unit.source: A number that is greater than or equal to <see cref="F:System.Double.MinValue" />, but less than or equal to <see cref="F:System.Double.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 大於或等於 <see cref="F:System.Double.MinValue" />但小於或等於 <see cref="F:System.Double.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: Returns the absolute value of a double-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 傳回雙精確度浮點數的絕對值。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point number, x, such that 0 ≤ x ≤<see cref="F:System.Double.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 雙精確度浮點數 x，其滿足下列條件 0 ≤ x ≤<see cref="F:System.Double.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The absolute value of a <xref:System.Double> is its numeric value without its sign.
trans-unit.target: 數值的絕對值<xref:System.Double>是沒有正負號的數值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the absolute value of both 1.2e03 and -1.2e03 is 1.2e03.
trans-unit.target: 例如，同時 1.2e03 和-1.2e03 絕對值是 1.2e03。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is equal to <xref:System.Double.NegativeInfinity> or <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>, the return value is <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`等於<xref:System.Double.NegativeInfinity>或<xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>，則傳回值是<xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is equal to <xref:System.Double.NaN>, the return value is <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`等於<xref:System.Double.NaN>，則傳回值是<xref:System.Double.NaN>。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Math.Abs%28System.Double%29> method to get the absolute value of a number of <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Math.Abs%28System.Double%29>方法來取得的數字的絕對值<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: A number that is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int16.MinValue" />, but less than or equal to <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 大於 <see cref="F:System.Int16.MinValue" />但小於或等於 <see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: Returns the absolute value of a 16-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 16 位元帶正負號整數的絕對值。

trans-unit.source: A 16-bit signed integer, x, such that 0 ≤ x ≤<see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 16 位元帶正負號整數 x，其滿足下列條件 0 ≤ x ≤<see cref="F:System.Int16.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The absolute value of an <xref:System.Int16> is its numeric value without its sign.
trans-unit.target: 數值的絕對值<xref:System.Int16>是沒有正負號的數值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the absolute value of both 123 and -123 is 123.
trans-unit.target: 例如，123 和-123 的絕對值是 123。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Math.Abs%28System.Int16%29> method to get the absolute value of a number of <xref:System.Int16> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Math.Abs%28System.Int16%29>方法來取得的數字的絕對值<xref:System.Int16>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> equals <see cref="F:System.Int16.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />等於 <see cref="F:System.Int16.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: A number that is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" />, but less than or equal to <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" />但小於或等於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.target: 傳回 32 位元帶正負號整數的絕對值。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer, x, such that 0 ≤ x ≤<see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號整數 x，其滿足下列條件 0 ≤ x ≤<see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The absolute value of an <xref:System.Int32> is its numeric value without its sign.
trans-unit.target: 數值的絕對值<xref:System.Int32>是沒有正負號的數值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the absolute value of both 123 and -123 is 123.
trans-unit.target: 例如，123 和-123 的絕對值是 123。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Math.Abs%28System.Int32%29> method to get the absolute value of a number of <xref:System.Int32> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Math.Abs%28System.Int32%29>方法來取得的數字的絕對值<xref:System.Int32>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> equals <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />等於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: A number that is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int64.MinValue" />, but less than or equal to <see cref="F:System.Int64.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 大於 <see cref="F:System.Int64.MinValue" />但小於或等於 <see cref="F:System.Int64.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: Returns the absolute value of a 64-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 64 位元帶正負號整數的絕對值。

trans-unit.source: A 64-bit signed integer, x, such that 0 ≤ x ≤<see cref="F:System.Int64.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 64 位元帶正負號整數 x，其滿足下列條件 0 ≤ x ≤<see cref="F:System.Int64.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The absolute value of an <xref:System.Int64> is its numeric value without its sign.
trans-unit.target: 數值的絕對值<xref:System.Int64>是沒有正負號的數值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the absolute value of both 123 and -123 is 123.
trans-unit.target: 例如，123 和-123 的絕對值是 123。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Math.Abs%28System.Int64%29> method to get the absolute value of a number of <xref:System.Int64> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Math.Abs%28System.Int64%29>方法來取得的數字的絕對值<xref:System.Int64>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> equals <see cref="F:System.Int64.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />等於 <see cref="F:System.Int64.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: A number that is greater than <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" />, but less than or equal to <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 大於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" />但小於或等於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: Returns the absolute value of an 8-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 8 位元帶正負號整數的絕對值。

trans-unit.source: An 8-bit signed integer, x, such that 0 ≤ x ≤<see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 8 位元帶正負號整數 x，其滿足下列條件 0 ≤ x ≤<see cref="F:System.SByte.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The absolute value of a signed byte is its numeric value without its sign.
trans-unit.target: 將帶正負號位元組的絕對值是沒有正負號的數字值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the absolute value of both 12 and -12 is 12.
trans-unit.target: 例如，12 和-12 的絕對值是 12。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Math.Abs%28System.SByte%29> method to get the absolute value of a number of <xref:System.SByte> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Math.Abs%28System.SByte%29>方法來取得的數字的絕對值<xref:System.SByte>值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> equals <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />等於 <see cref="F:System.SByte.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: A number that is greater than or equal to <see cref="F:System.Single.MinValue" />, but less than or equal to <see cref="F:System.Single.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 大於或等於 <see cref="F:System.Single.MinValue" />但小於或等於 <see cref="F:System.Single.MaxValue" /> 的數字。

trans-unit.source: Returns the absolute value of a single-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 傳回單精確度浮點數的絕對值。

trans-unit.source: A single-precision floating-point number, x, such that 0 ≤ x ≤<see cref="F:System.Single.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 單精確度浮點數 x，其滿足下列條件 0 ≤ x ≤<see cref="F:System.Single.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The absolute value of a <xref:System.Single> is its numeric value without its sign.
trans-unit.target: 數值的絕對值<xref:System.Single>是沒有正負號的數值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the absolute value of both 1.2e-03 and -1.2e03 is 1.2e03.
trans-unit.target: 例如，數值的絕對值這兩個為 1.2 e-03 和 1.2e03 是 1.2e03。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is equal to <xref:System.Single.NegativeInfinity> or <xref:System.Single.PositiveInfinity>, the return value is <xref:System.Single.PositiveInfinity>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`等於<xref:System.Single.NegativeInfinity>或<xref:System.Single.PositiveInfinity>，則傳回值是<xref:System.Single.PositiveInfinity>。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is equal to <xref:System.Single.NaN>, the return value is <xref:System.Single.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`value`等於<xref:System.Single.NaN>，則傳回值是<xref:System.Single.NaN>。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Math.Abs%28System.Single%29> method to get the absolute value of a number of <xref:System.Single> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Math.Abs%28System.Single%29>方法來取得的數字的絕對值<xref:System.Single>值。

trans-unit.source: A number representing a cosine, where <c>d</c> must be greater than or equal to -1, but less than or equal to 1.
trans-unit.target: 代表餘弦函數的數字，其中 <c>d</c> 必須大於或等於 -1 但小於或等於 1。

trans-unit.source: Returns the angle whose cosine is the specified number.
trans-unit.target: 傳回餘弦函數 (Cosine) 是指定數字的角。

trans-unit.source: An angle, θ, measured in radians, such that 0 ≤θ≤π
trans-unit.target: 以弧度為單位的角度 θ，其滿足下列條件 0 ≤θ≤π

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" /> if <paramref name="d" /> < -1 or <paramref name="d" /> > 1 or <paramref name="d" /> equals <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="d" /> < -1 或 <paramref name="d" /> > 1 或 <paramref name="d" /> 等於 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />，則為 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />。

trans-unit.source: Multiply the return value by 180/<xref:System.Math.PI?displayProperty=nameWithType> to convert from radians to degrees.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的值乘以 180 /<xref:System.Math.PI?displayProperty=nameWithType>從弧度轉換為度。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Math.Acos%2A> method to assist in the computation of the inner angles of a given trapezoid.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Math.Acos%2A>方法，以協助指定 trapezoid 內部角度的計算。

trans-unit.source: A number representing a sine, where <c>d</c> must be greater than or equal to -1, but less than or equal to 1.
trans-unit.target: 代表正弦函數的數字，其中 <c>d</c> 必須大於或等於 -1，但小於或等於 1。

trans-unit.source: Returns the angle whose sine is the specified number.
trans-unit.target: 傳回正弦函數 (Sine) 是指定數字的角。

trans-unit.source: An angle, θ, measured in radians, such that -π/2 ≤θ≤π/2
trans-unit.target: 以弧度為單位的角度 θ，其滿足下列條件 -π/2 ≤θ≤π/2

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" /> if <paramref name="d" /> < -1 or <paramref name="d" /> > 1 or <paramref name="d" /> equals <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="d" /> < -1 或 <paramref name="d" /> > 1 或 <paramref name="d" /> 等於 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />，則為 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />。

trans-unit.source: A positive return value represents a counterclockwise angle from the x-axis; a negative return value represents a clockwise angle.
trans-unit.target: 傳回正值代表以逆時針算起的角度從 x 軸。傳回負值代表順時針旋轉的角度。

trans-unit.source: Multiply the return value by 180/<xref:System.Math.PI?displayProperty=nameWithType> to convert from radians to degrees.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的值乘以 180 /<xref:System.Math.PI?displayProperty=nameWithType>從弧度轉換為度。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses <xref:System.Math.Asin%2A> to assist in the computation of the inner angles of a given trapezoid.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Math.Asin%2A>協助給定 trapezoid 內部角度的計算。

trans-unit.source: A number representing a tangent.
trans-unit.target: 代表正切的數字。

trans-unit.source: Returns the angle whose tangent is the specified number.
trans-unit.target: 傳回正切函數 (Tangent) 是指定數字的角。

trans-unit.source: An angle, θ, measured in radians, such that -π/2 ≤θ≤π/2.
trans-unit.target: 以弧度為單位的角度 θ，其滿足下列條件 -π/2 ≤θ≤π/2。

trans-unit.source: -or-

<see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" /> if <paramref name="d" /> equals <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, -π/2 rounded to double precision (-1.5707963267949) if <paramref name="d" /> equals <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" />, or π/2 rounded to double precision (1.5707963267949) if <paramref name="d" /> equals <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="d" /> 等於 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />，則為 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />；如果 <paramref name="d" /> 等於 <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" />，則為 -π/2，四捨五入為雙精度 (-1.5707963267949)；如果 <paramref name="d" /> 等於 <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />，則為 π/2，四捨五入為雙精度 (1.5707963267949)。

trans-unit.source: A positive return value represents a counterclockwise angle from the x-axis; a negative return value represents a clockwise angle.
trans-unit.target: 傳回正值代表以逆時針算起的角度從 x 軸。傳回負值代表順時針旋轉的角度。

trans-unit.source: Multiply the return value by 180/<xref:System.Math.PI?displayProperty=nameWithType> to convert from radians to degrees.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的值乘以 180 /<xref:System.Math.PI?displayProperty=nameWithType>從弧度轉換為度。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to calculate the arctangent of a value and display it to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何計算的反正切值，並顯示到主控台。

trans-unit.source: The y coordinate of a point.
trans-unit.target: 某個點的 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: The x coordinate of a point.
trans-unit.target: 某個點的 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: Returns the angle whose tangent is the quotient of two specified numbers.
trans-unit.target: 傳回正切函數是兩個指定數字之商數的角。

trans-unit.source: An angle, θ, measured in radians, such that -π≤θ≤π, and tan(θ) = <paramref name="y" /> / <paramref name="x" />, where (<paramref name="x" />, <paramref name="y" />) is a point in the Cartesian plane.
trans-unit.target: 以弧度為單位的角度 θ，其滿足下列條件 -π≤θ≤π，且 tan(θ) = <paramref name="y" /> / <paramref name="x" />，其中 (<paramref name="x" />, <paramref name="y" />) 是笛卡兒平面上的點。

trans-unit.source: Observe the following:
trans-unit.target: 注意下列各項：

trans-unit.source: For (<paramref name="x" />, <paramref name="y" />) in quadrant 1, 0 < θ < π/2.
trans-unit.target: 如果 (<paramref name="x" />, <paramref name="y" />) 在第 1 象限，則 0 < θ < π/2。

trans-unit.source: For (<paramref name="x" />, <paramref name="y" />) in quadrant 2, π/2 < θ≤π.
trans-unit.target: 如果 (<paramref name="x" />, <paramref name="y" />) 在第 2 象限，則 π/2 < θ≤π。

trans-unit.source: For (<paramref name="x" />, <paramref name="y" />) in quadrant 3, -π < θ < -π/2.
trans-unit.target: 如果 (<paramref name="x" />, <paramref name="y" />) 在第 3 象限，則 -π < θ < -π/2。

trans-unit.source: For (<paramref name="x" />, <paramref name="y" />) in quadrant 4, -π/2 < θ < 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 (<paramref name="x" />, <paramref name="y" />) 在第 4 象限，則 -π/2 < θ < 0。

trans-unit.source: For points on the boundaries of the quadrants, the return value is the following:
trans-unit.target: 如果是位在象限界限上的點，則傳回值如下：

trans-unit.source: If y is 0 and x is not negative, θ = 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 y 是 0，且 x 不是負值，則 θ = 0。

trans-unit.source: If y is 0 and x is negative, θ = π.
trans-unit.target: 如果 y 是 0，且 x 是負值，則 θ = π。

trans-unit.source: If y is positive and x is 0, θ = π/2.
trans-unit.target: 如果 y 是正值，且 x 是 0，則 θ = π/2。

trans-unit.source: If y is negative and x is 0, θ = -π/2.
trans-unit.target: 如果 y 是負值，而 x 是 0，則 θ = -π/2。

trans-unit.source: If y is 0 and x is 0, θ = 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 y 是 0 且 x 是 0，則 θ = 0。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="x" /> or <paramref name="y" /> is <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, or if <paramref name="x" /> and <paramref name="y" /> are either <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" /> or <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" />, the method returns <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="x" /> 或 <paramref name="y" /> 為 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />，或者 <paramref name="x" /> 和 <paramref name="y" /> 為 <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" />，這個方法會傳回 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the angle in the Cartesian plane formed by the x-axis, and a vector starting from the origin, (0,0), and terminating at the point, (x,y).
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是由 x 軸和向量從原點 (0，0) 開始和結束點、 （x，y） 組成的笛卡兒平面中的角度。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to calculate the arctangent of an angle and a vector.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何計算反正切值的角度和向量。

trans-unit.source: The resulting value is displayed in the console.
trans-unit.target: 產生的值會顯示在主控台中。

trans-unit.source: The first number to multiply.
trans-unit.target: 要相乘的第一個數字。

trans-unit.source: The second number to multiply.
trans-unit.target: 要相乘的第二個數字。

trans-unit.source: Produces the full product of two 32-bit numbers.
trans-unit.target: 產生兩個 32 位元數字的完整產品。

trans-unit.source: The number containing the product of the specified numbers.
trans-unit.target: 包含指定數字之乘積的數字。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Math.BigMul%2A> method to calculate the product of two integer values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Math.BigMul%2A>方法來計算兩個整數值的乘積。

trans-unit.source: Returns the smallest integral value greater than or equal to the specified number.
trans-unit.target: 傳回大於或等於指定數字的最小整數值。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of this method follows IEEE Standard 754, section 4.

trans-unit.source: This kind of rounding is sometimes called rounding toward positive infinity.

trans-unit.source: A decimal number.
trans-unit.target: 十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: Returns the smallest integral value that is greater than or equal to the specified decimal number.
trans-unit.target: 傳回大於或等於指定之十進位數字的最小整數值。

trans-unit.source: The smallest integral value that is greater than or equal to <paramref name="d" />.
trans-unit.target: 大於或等於 <paramref name="d" /> 的最小整數值。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method returns a <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> instead of an integral type.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這個方法會傳回 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" />，而不是整數類型。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of this method follows IEEE Standard 754, section 4.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的行為遵循 IEEE 標準 754，第 4 節。

trans-unit.source: This kind of rounding is sometimes called rounding toward positive infinity.
trans-unit.target: 這種捨入有時稱為捨入朝向正無限大。

trans-unit.source: In other words, if `d` is positive, the presence of any fractional component causes `d` to be rounded to the next highest integer.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，如果`d`是正數，是否存在任何小數部分原因`d`捨入至下一個最大整數。

trans-unit.source: If `d` is negative, the rounding operation causes any fractional component of `d` to be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果`d`是負數，捨入作業會導致任何小數部分`d`遭到捨棄。

trans-unit.source: The operation of this method differs from the <xref:System.Math.Floor%28System.Decimal%29> method, which supports rounding toward negative infinity.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的作業不同於<xref:System.Math.Floor%28System.Decimal%29>方法，支援往負無限大方向捨入。

trans-unit.source: A number equal to <paramref name="x" /> - (<paramref name="y" /> Q), where Q is the quotient of <paramref name="x" /> / <paramref name="y" /> rounded to the nearest integer (if <paramref name="x" /> / <paramref name="y" /> falls halfway between two integers, the even integer is returned).
trans-unit.target: 等於 <paramref name="x" /> - ( <paramref name="y" /> Q) 的數字，其中 Q 是捨入至最接近整數的 <paramref name="x" /> / <paramref name="y" /> 商數 (如果 <paramref name="x" /> / <paramref name="y" /> 是兩個整數的中間數，則會傳回偶數整數)。

trans-unit.source: Represents the ratio of the circumference of a circle to its diameter, specified by the constant, π.
trans-unit.target: 代表圓周率，由常數 π 指定。

trans-unit.source: The value of this field is 3.14159265358979323846.
The following example uses <xref:System.Math.PI> to assist in the computation of the inner angles of a given trapezoid.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Math.PI>協助給定 trapezoid 內部角度的計算。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point number to be raised to a power.
trans-unit.target: 雙精確度浮點數，做為乘冪數。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point number that specifies a power.
trans-unit.target: 雙精確度浮點數，用來指定乘冪數。

trans-unit.source: Returns a specified number raised to the specified power.
trans-unit.target: 傳回具有指定乘冪數的指定數字。

trans-unit.source: The number <paramref name="x" /> raised to the power <paramref name="y" />.
trans-unit.target: 數字 <paramref name="x" /> 的 <paramref name="y" /> 次方。

trans-unit.source: The following table indicates the return value when various values or ranges of values are specified for the `x` and `y` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 下表指出傳回的值，指定不同的值的範圍時`x`和`y`參數。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Double.NegativeInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType>、<xref:System.Double.NegativeInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Parameters
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: Return value
trans-unit.target: 傳回值

trans-unit.source: `x` or `y` = `NaN`.
trans-unit.target: `x` 或`y` = `NaN`。

trans-unit.source: `x` = Any value except `NaN`; `y` = 0.
trans-unit.target: `x` = 以外的任何值`NaN`;`y` = 0。

trans-unit.source: `x` = `NegativeInfinity`; `y` < 0.
trans-unit.target: `x` = `NegativeInfinity`; `y` < 0.

trans-unit.source: `x` = `NegativeInfinity`; `y` is a positive odd integer.
trans-unit.target: `x` = `NegativeInfinity`;`y`奇數的正整數。

trans-unit.source: `x` = `NegativeInfinity`; `y` is positive but not an odd integer.
trans-unit.target: `x` = `NegativeInfinity`;`y`是正數，但不是奇數整數。

trans-unit.source: `x` < 0 but not `NegativeInfinity`; `y` is not an integer, `NegativeInfinity`, or `PositiveInfinity`.
trans-unit.target: `x` < 0，但不是`NegativeInfinity`;`y`不是整數， `NegativeInfinity`，或`PositiveInfinity`。

trans-unit.source: `x` = -1; `y` = `NegativeInfinity` or `PositiveInfinity`.
trans-unit.target: `x` =-1;`y` = `NegativeInfinity`或`PositiveInfinity`。

trans-unit.source: -1 < `x` < 1; `y` = `NegativeInfinity`.
trans-unit.target: -1 < `x` < 1; `y` = `NegativeInfinity`.

trans-unit.source: -1 < `x` < 1; `y` = `PositiveInfinity`.
trans-unit.target: -1 < `x` < 1; `y` = `PositiveInfinity`.

trans-unit.source: `x` < -1 or `x` > 1; `y` = `NegativeInfinity`.
trans-unit.target: `x` < -1 or `x` > 1; `y` = `NegativeInfinity`.

trans-unit.source: `x` < -1 or `x` > 1; `y` = `PositiveInfinity`.
trans-unit.target: `x` < -1 or `x` > 1; `y` = `PositiveInfinity`.

trans-unit.source: `x` = 1; `y` is any value except `NaN`.
trans-unit.target: `x` = 1。`y`是以外的任何值`NaN`。

trans-unit.source: `x` = `PositiveInfinity`; `y` < 0.
trans-unit.target: `x` = `PositiveInfinity`; `y` < 0.

trans-unit.source: `x` = `PositiveInfinity`; `y` > 0.
trans-unit.target: `x` = `PositiveInfinity`; `y` > 0.

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Math.Pow%2A>方法來計算所產生的引發 2 乘冪，範圍從 0 到 32 的值。

trans-unit.source: Rounds a decimal value to the nearest integer, and rounds midpoint values to the nearest even number ([example](#Round1_Example)).
trans-unit.target: 十進位將值四捨五入為最接近的整數，並會四捨五入至最接近的偶數的中點值 ([範例](#Round1_Example))。

trans-unit.source: Rounds a double-precision floating-point value to the nearest integer, and rounds midpoint values to the nearest even number ([example](#Round2_Example)).
trans-unit.target: 雙精確度浮點數捨入為最接近的整數，並會四捨五入至最接近的偶數的中點值 ([範例](#Round2_Example))。

trans-unit.source: Rounds a decimal value to a specified number of fractional digits, and rounds midpoint values to the nearest even number ([example](#Round3_Example)).
trans-unit.target: 將指定的數字的小數數字，十進位值四捨五入，並會四捨五入至最接近的偶數的中點值 ([範例](#Round3_Example))。

trans-unit.source: Rounds a double-precision floating-point value to a specified number of fractional digits, and rounds midpoint values to the nearest even number ([example](#Round4_Example)).
trans-unit.target: 雙精確度浮點數捨入為指定的數字的小數數字，並會四捨五入至最接近的偶數的中點值 ([範例](#Round4_Example))。

trans-unit.source: Rounds a decimal value to the nearest integer, and uses the specified rounding convention for midpoint values ([example](#Round5_Example)).
trans-unit.target: 會四捨五入為最接近的整數，十進位值，並使用指定的捨入慣例的中點值 ([範例](#Round5_Example))。

trans-unit.source: Rounds a double-precision floating-point value to the nearest integer, and uses the specified rounding convention for midpoint values ([example](#Round6_Example)).
trans-unit.target: 雙精確度浮點數捨入為最接近的整數，並使用指定的捨入慣例的中點值 ([範例](#Round6_Example))。

trans-unit.source: Rounds a decimal value to a specified number of fractional digits, and uses the specified rounding convention for midpoint values ([example](#Round7_Example)).
trans-unit.target: 將指定的數字的小數數字，十進位值四捨五入，並使用指定的捨入慣例的中點值 ([範例](#Round7_Example))。

trans-unit.source: Rounds a double-precision floating-point value to a specified number of fractional digits, and uses the specified rounding convention for midpoint values ([example](#Round8_Example)).
trans-unit.target: 雙精確度浮點數捨入為指定的數字的小數數字，並使用指定的捨入慣例的中點值 ([範例](#Round8_Example))。

trans-unit.target: 這是完整的參數清單<xref:System.Math.Round%2A>方法。

trans-unit.target: 每個多載所使用的參數，請參閱上述的多載語法。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: Type
trans-unit.target: 類型

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: A number to be rounded.
trans-unit.target: 要四捨五入的數字。

trans-unit.source: -or-
A double-precision floating-point number to be rounded.
trans-unit.target: 要四捨五入的雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The number of fractional digits in the return value.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值中小數點後數字的數目。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Decimal> values, it can range from 0 to 28.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Decimal>值，它的範圍從 0 至 28。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Double> values, it can range from 0 to 15.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Double>值，它的範圍從 0 到 15。

trans-unit.source: Note that 15 is the maximum number of integral and fractional digits supported by the <xref:System.Double> type.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，15 整數和小數的數字所支援的最大數目<xref:System.Double>型別。

trans-unit.source: Default value: 0, which rounds to an integer
trans-unit.target: 預設值： 0，這會四捨五入到整數

trans-unit.source: A flag that specifies the convention to use for rounding midpoint values.
trans-unit.target: 旗標，指定要用於中間值捨入的慣例。

trans-unit.source: See [Midpoint values and rounding conventions](#Midpoint).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[中間值和捨入慣例](#Midpoint)。

trans-unit.source: Default value: <xref:System.MidpointRounding.ToEven?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 預設值： <xref:System.MidpointRounding.ToEven?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: Return value
trans-unit.target: 傳回值

trans-unit.source: Type: <xref:System.Decimal> or <xref:System.Double>, depending on the type of the value to be rounded.
trans-unit.target: 類型：<xref:System.Decimal>或<xref:System.Double>，取決於要捨入值的型別。

trans-unit.source: A numeric value of the same type as `d`, `a`, or `value`, but rounded either to an integer or to the specified number of decimal digits.
trans-unit.target: 數值為相同型別的`d`， `a`，或`value`，但捨入為整數或十進位數字的指定數目。

trans-unit.source: See [Midpoint values and rounding conventions](#Midpoint) for information about rounding numbers with midpoint values.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[中間值和捨入慣例](#Midpoint)的中點值的數字四捨五入的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: When rounding midpoint values, the rounding algorithm performs an equality test.
trans-unit.target: 捨入中間點的值，當此捨入的演算法會執行等號比較測試。

trans-unit.source: Because of problems of binary representation and precision in the floating-point format, the value returned by the method can be unexpected.
trans-unit.target: 二進位表示法和浮點格式的有效位數的問題，因為方法所傳回的值可以是未預期的。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rounding and precision](#Precision).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[數字捨入和精確度](#Precision)。

trans-unit.source: If an overload with a <xref:System.Double> parameter is called with <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the method returns <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用多載<xref:System.Double>參數以呼叫<xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>，方法會傳回<xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If it is called with <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Double.NegativeInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the method returns <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Double.NegativeInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用呼叫<xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Double.NegativeInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType>，方法會傳回<xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Double.NegativeInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType>分別。

trans-unit.target: 以

trans-unit.target: Call

trans-unit.source: Round a number to an integer by using the rounding to nearest convention.
trans-unit.target: 使用四捨五入為最接近的慣例四捨五入成整數的數字。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Round a number to an integer by using a specified rounding convention.
trans-unit.target: 透過使用指定為整數的數字無條件捨入慣例。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Round a number to a specified number of fractional digits by using the rounding to nearest convention.
trans-unit.target: 使用四捨五入為最接近的慣例四捨五入到指定的小數位數的數字。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Round a number to a specified number of fractional digits by using a specified rounding convention.
trans-unit.target: 指定的數目，透過使用指定的小數位數的數字無條件捨入慣例。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Round a <xref:System.Single> value to a specified number of fractional digits by using a specified rounding convention and minimizing the loss of precision.
trans-unit.target: Round<xref:System.Single>值到指定的數字，藉由指定捨入慣例和最小化遺失有效位數的小數位數。

trans-unit.source: Convert the <xref:System.Single> to a <xref:System.Decimal> and call <xref:System.Math.Round%28System.Decimal%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.MidpointRounding%29>.
trans-unit.target: 轉換<xref:System.Single>至<xref:System.Decimal>呼叫<xref:System.Math.Round%28System.Decimal%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.MidpointRounding%29>。

trans-unit.source: Round a number to a specified number of fractional digits while minimizing problems of precision in rounding midpoint values.
trans-unit.target: 將數值四捨五入到指定的小數位數降至最低的中點數值四捨五入的精確度的問題。

trans-unit.source: Call a rounding method that implements a "greater than or approximately equal to" comparison.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫實作 「 大於或大約等於"比較的捨入方法。

trans-unit.source: See [Rounding and precision](#Precision).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[數字捨入和精確度](#Precision)。

trans-unit.source: Round a fractional value to an integer that is greater than the fractional value.
trans-unit.target: 四捨五入成整數的小數值大於小數的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, round 3.1 to 4.
trans-unit.target: 例如，四捨五入至 4 3.1。

trans-unit.source: Round a fractional value to an integer that is less than the fractional value.
trans-unit.target: Round 小數的值為整數，小於小數的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, round 3.9 to 3.
trans-unit.target: 例如，四捨五入 3.9 到 3。

trans-unit.source: Midpoint values and rounding conventions
trans-unit.target: 中間值和捨入慣例

trans-unit.source: Rounding involves converting a numeric value with a specified precision to the nearest value with less precision.
trans-unit.target: 捨入牽涉到將具有指定的有效位數的數值轉換成最接近的值較少精確度。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the <xref:System.Math.Round%28System.Double%29> method to round a value of 3.4 to 3.0, and the <xref:System.Math.Round%28System.Double%2CSystem.Int32%29> method to round a value of 3.579 to 3.58.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用<xref:System.Math.Round%28System.Double%29>要捨入到 3.0 3.4 值的方法和<xref:System.Math.Round%28System.Double%2CSystem.Int32%29>要捨入至 3.58 3.579 值的方法。

trans-unit.source: In a midpoint value, the value after the least significant digit in the result is precisely half way between two numbers.
trans-unit.target: 在的中點值，結果中的最小顯著性數字後的值會是精確之間的一半兩個數字。

trans-unit.source: For example, 3.47500 is a midpoint value if it is to be rounded two decimal places, and 7.500 is a midpoint value if it is to be rounded to an integer.
trans-unit.target: 例如，3.47500 是中間值，如果要進位的兩個小數位數，而且 7.500 是中間值，如果是要四捨五入成整數。

trans-unit.source: In these cases, the nearest value can't be easily identified without a rounding convention.
trans-unit.target: 在這些情況下，最接近的值無法輕鬆地識別沒有捨入的慣例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Math.Round%2A> method supports two rounding conventions for handling midpoint values:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Math.Round%2A>方法支援兩種捨入慣例來處理中點值：

trans-unit.source: **Rounding away from zero**
trans-unit.target: **背離零四捨五入**

trans-unit.source: Midpoint values are rounded to the next number away from zero.
trans-unit.target: 中間點的值會捨去遠離零的下一個編號。

trans-unit.source: For example, 3.75 rounds to 3.8, 3.85 rounds to 3.9, -3.75 rounds to -3.8, and -3.85 rounds to -3.9.
This form of rounding is represented by the <xref:System.MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration member.
trans-unit.target: 這種形式的捨入由<xref:System.MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero?displayProperty=nameWithType>列舉成員。

trans-unit.source: Rounding away from zero is the most widely known form of rounding.
trans-unit.target: 背離零四捨五入是最廣泛已知的形式的捨入。

trans-unit.source: **Rounding to nearest, or banker's rounding**
trans-unit.target: **四捨五入為最接近，或成雙**

trans-unit.source: Midpoint values are rounded to the nearest even number.
trans-unit.target: 中間值會四捨五入至最接近的偶數。

trans-unit.source: For example, both 3.75 and 3.85 round to 3.8, and both -3.75 and -3.85 round to -3.8.
This form of rounding is represented by the <xref:System.MidpointRounding.ToEven?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration member.
trans-unit.target: 這種形式的捨入由<xref:System.MidpointRounding.ToEven?displayProperty=nameWithType>列舉成員。

trans-unit.source: Rounding to nearest is the standard form of rounding used in financial and statistical operations.
trans-unit.target: 四捨五入為最接近是捨入財務和統計作業中使用的標準形式。

trans-unit.source: It conforms to IEEE Standard 754, section 4.
trans-unit.target: 其符合標準 ieee-754，第 4 節。

trans-unit.source: When used in multiple rounding operations, it reduces the rounding error that is caused by consistently rounding midpoint values in a single direction.
trans-unit.target: 多個的捨入運算中使用時，它會減少因一致四捨五入單向中的點值捨入錯誤。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, this rounding error can be significant.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，此捨入錯誤可能十分顯著。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the bias that can result from consistently rounding midpoint values in a single direction.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明可能的結果一致四捨五入單向中的點值的偏差。

trans-unit.source: The example computes the true mean of an array of <xref:System.Decimal> values, and then computes the mean when the values in the array are rounded by using the two conventions.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會計算的陣列，則為 true 平均值<xref:System.Decimal>值，然後再計算平均數，當陣列中的值會捨入所使用的兩個慣例。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the true mean and the mean that results when rounding to nearest are the same.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，則為 true 的平均差和捨入為最接近時，所造成的平均值都相同。

trans-unit.source: However, the mean that results when rounding away from zero differs by .05 (or by 3.6%) from the true mean.
trans-unit.target: 不過，背離零四捨五入時結果的平均值不同.05 （或 3.6%），則為 true 的平均值。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Math.Round%2A> method uses the rounding to nearest convention.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Math.Round%2A>方法會使用四捨五入為最接近的慣例。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the overloads of the <xref:System.Math.Round%2A> method and the rounding convention that each uses.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的多載<xref:System.Math.Round%2A>方法和捨入慣例都是使用。

trans-unit.source: Overload
trans-unit.target: 多載

trans-unit.source: Rounding convention
trans-unit.target: 捨入慣例

trans-unit.source: Determined by `mode` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 由`mode`參數。

trans-unit.source: Determined by `mode` parameter
trans-unit.target: 由`mode`參數

trans-unit.source: Determined by `mode` parameter
trans-unit.target: 由`mode`參數

trans-unit.source: Determined by `mode` parameter
trans-unit.target: 由`mode`參數

trans-unit.source: Rounding and precision
trans-unit.target: 捨入和有效位數

trans-unit.source: In order to determine whether a rounding operation involves a midpoint value, the <xref:System.Math.Round%2A> method multiplies the original value to be rounded by 10<sup>n</sup>, where *n* is the desired number of fractional digits in the return value, and then determines whether the remaining fractional portion of the value is greater than or equal to .5.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否捨入運算牽涉到中點值，<xref:System.Math.Round%2A>方法乘以 10 捨入的原始值<sup>n</sup>，其中*n*是需要的毫秒數在傳回的值中的數字，然後決定剩餘的小數部分的值是否大於或等於.5。

trans-unit.source: This is a slight variation on a test for equality, and as discussed in the "Testing for Equality" section of the <xref:System.Double> reference topic, tests for equality with floating-point values are problematic because of the floating-point format's issues with binary representation and precision.
trans-unit.target: 這是稍有不同的 「 為等號比較測試 」 區段中的測試是否相等，以及討論<xref:System.Double>因為浮點格式的問題與二進位參考主題，具有浮點值是否相等的測試會有問題表示和有效位數。

trans-unit.source: This means that any fractional portion of a number that is slightly less than .5 (because of a loss of precision) will not be rounded upward.
trans-unit.target: 這表示不能在向上四捨五入為略小於.5 （因為遺失有效位數） 的數字的小數部分。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the problem.
trans-unit.target: 下面範例會說明此問題。

trans-unit.source: It repeatedly adds .1 to 11.0 and rounds the result to the nearest integer.
trans-unit.target: 重複，它會新增至 11.0.1 並四捨五入到最接近的整數。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the rounding convention, 11.5 should round to 12.
trans-unit.target: 捨入的慣例，不論 11.5 應該捨入 12。

trans-unit.source: However, as the output from the example shows, it does not.
trans-unit.target: 不過，此範例將示範的輸出，則沒有。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the "R" [standard numeric format string](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) to display the floating point value's full precision, and shows that the value to be rounded has lost precision during repeated additions, and its value is actually 11.499999999999998.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用"R"[標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)顯示浮點值的完整有效位數，並顯示来四捨五入的值已遺失有效位數，期間重複新增項目，和其值實際上是11.499999999999998。

trans-unit.source: Because .499999999999998 is less than .5, the value is not rounded to the next highest integer.
trans-unit.target: 因為.499999999999998 小於.5，值不會四捨五入至下一個最大整數。

trans-unit.source: As the example also shows, this problem does not occur if we simply assign the constant value 11.5 to a <xref:System.Double> variable.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也示範，因為這個問題不會發生在我們只會指派到的常數值 11.5<xref:System.Double>變數。

trans-unit.source: Problems of precision in rounding midpoint values are most likely to arise in the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: 問題中捨入中間值的有效位數最有可能會發生下列情況：

trans-unit.source: When a fractional value cannot be expressed precisely in the floating-point type's binary format.
trans-unit.target: 當小數的值無法精確的浮點類型的二進位格式來表示。

trans-unit.source: When the value to be rounded is calculated from one or more floating-point operations.
trans-unit.target: 當要四捨五入的值會計算從一個或多個浮點運算。

trans-unit.source: When the value to be rounded is a <xref:System.Single> rather than a <xref:System.Double> or <xref:System.Decimal>.
trans-unit.target: 要四捨五入的值時<xref:System.Single>而<xref:System.Double>或<xref:System.Decimal>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the next section, [Rounding and single-precision floating-point values](#Single).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱下節中，[數字捨入和單一單精確度浮點值](#Single)。

trans-unit.source: In cases where the lack of precision in rounding operations is problematic, you can do the following:
trans-unit.target: 您可以在其中缺少中捨入作業的有效位數是有問題的情況下，執行下列作業：

trans-unit.source: If the rounding operation calls an overload that rounds a <xref:System.Double> value, you can change the <xref:System.Double> to a <xref:System.Decimal> value and call an overload that rounds a <xref:System.Decimal> value instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果捨入運算呼叫多載，捨入<xref:System.Double>值，您可以變更<xref:System.Double>至<xref:System.Decimal>值，並呼叫多載，捨入<xref:System.Decimal>值改為。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Decimal> data type also has problems of representation and loss of precision, these issues are far less common.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Decimal>資料型別也有表示法的問題和遺失有效位數，這些問題會遠較不常見。

trans-unit.source: Define a custom rounding algorithm that performs a "nearly equal" test to determine whether the value to be rounded is acceptably close to a midpoint value.
trans-unit.target: 定義自訂的捨入演算法會執行 「 幾乎等於 」 的測試，以判斷是否要四捨五入的值為下面接近中間值。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `RoundApproximate` method that examines whether a fractional value is sufficiently near to a midpoint value to be subject to midpoint rounding.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義`RoundApproximate`檢查小數值是否夠靠近是受制於捨入的中點中間值的方法。

trans-unit.source: As the output from the example shows, it corrects the rounding problem shown in the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 範例輸出所示，它便可以更正捨入前一範例所示的問題。

trans-unit.source: Rounding and single-precision floating-point values
trans-unit.target: 四捨五入和單精確度浮點值

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Math.Round%2A> method includes overloads that accept arguments of type <xref:System.Decimal> and <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Math.Round%2A>方法包含接受類型引數的多載<xref:System.Decimal>和<xref:System.Double>。

trans-unit.source: There are no methods that round values of type <xref:System.Single>.
trans-unit.target: 捨入值的型別沒有方法<xref:System.Single>。

trans-unit.source: If you pass a <xref:System.Single> value to one of the overloads of the <xref:System.Math.Round%2A> method, it is cast (in C#) or converted (in Visual Basic) to a <xref:System.Double>, and the corresponding <xref:System.Math.Round%2A> overload with a <xref:System.Double> parameter is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要傳入<xref:System.Single>值設為其中的多載<xref:System.Math.Round%2A>方法，它是轉型 （C# 中），或 （在 Visual Basic) 轉換成<xref:System.Double>，而且對應<xref:System.Math.Round%2A>多載<xref:System.Double>參數呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Although this is a widening conversion, it often involves a loss of precision, as the following example illustrates.
trans-unit.target: 雖然這是進行擴展轉換，但它通常會涉及失去有效位數，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Single> value of 16.325 is passed to the <xref:System.Math.Round%2A> method and rounded to two decimal places using the rounding to nearest convention, the result is 16.33 and not the expected result of 16.32.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Single>16.325 的值會傳遞至<xref:System.Math.Round%2A>方法四捨五入為兩個小數位數，使用四捨五入為最接近的慣例，會在結果的 16.32 16.33 和未預期的結果。

trans-unit.source: This unexpected result is due to a loss of precision in the conversion of the <xref:System.Single> value to a <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 這個非預期的結果是因為遺失有效位數的轉換<xref:System.Single>值設定為<xref:System.Double>。

trans-unit.source: Because the resulting <xref:System.Double> value of 16.325000762939453 is not a midpoint value and is greater than 16.325, it is always rounded upward.
trans-unit.target: 因為所產生的<xref:System.Double>16.325000762939453 的值不是中間值大於 16.325，一律向上四捨五入。

trans-unit.source: In many cases, as the example illustrates, the loss of precision can be minimized or eliminated by casting or converting the <xref:System.Single> value to a <xref:System.Decimal>.
trans-unit.target: 在許多情況下，如範例所示，遺失有效位數可以最小化或轉型或轉換以消除<xref:System.Single>值設定為<xref:System.Decimal>。

trans-unit.source: Note that, because this is a narrowing conversion, it requires using a cast operator or calling a conversion method.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這是縮小轉換，因為它需要使用轉換運算子，或呼叫轉換方法。

trans-unit.source: Math.Round(Decimal) example
trans-unit.target: Math.Round(Decimal) 範例

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Math.Round%28System.Decimal%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.Math.Round%28System.Decimal%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Decimal> value of 4.5 rounds to 4 rather than 5, because this overload uses the default <xref:System.MidpointRounding.ToEven> convention.
trans-unit.target: 請注意， <xref:System.Decimal> 4.5 的值會捨入為 4，而不是 5，因為這個多載會使用預設<xref:System.MidpointRounding.ToEven>慣例。

trans-unit.target: Math.Round(Double) 範例

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates rounding to the nearest integer value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範四捨五入到最接近的整數值。

trans-unit.target: Math.Round （Decimal、 Int32） 範例

trans-unit.source: The following example rounds decimal values with two fractional digits to values that have a single fractional digit.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將兩個位數小數都有單一的小數數字的值的十進位值。

trans-unit.source: Math.Round(Double, Int32) example
trans-unit.target: Math.Round (Double，Int32) 範例

trans-unit.source: The following example rounds double values with two fractional digits to doubles that have a single fractional digit.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將兩個位數小數都有單一的小數位數的雙精度浮點數的雙精度浮點數值。

trans-unit.source: Math.Round(Decimal, MidpointRounding) example

trans-unit.source: The following example displays values returned by the <xref:System.Math.Round%28System.Decimal%29> method, the <xref:System.Math.Round%28System.Decimal%2CSystem.MidpointRounding%29> method with a `mode` argument of <xref:System.MidpointRounding.ToEven>, and the <xref:System.Math.Round%28System.Decimal%2CSystem.MidpointRounding%29> method with a `mode` argument of <xref:System.MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero>.

trans-unit.source: A decimal number to be rounded.
trans-unit.target: 要四捨五入的十進位數字。

trans-unit.source: Rounds a decimal value to the nearest integral value.
trans-unit.target: 將十進位的值四捨五入為最接近的整數值。

trans-unit.source: The integer nearest parameter <paramref name="d" />.
trans-unit.target: 最接近參數 <paramref name="d" /> 的整數。

trans-unit.source: If the fractional component of <paramref name="d" /> is halfway between two integers, one of which is even and the other odd, the even number is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="d" /> 的小數部分正好為兩個整數的中間數 (一個為偶數，另一個為奇數)，則會傳回偶數。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method returns a <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> instead of an integral type.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這個方法會傳回 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" />，而不是整數類型。

trans-unit.source: For examples and comprehensive usage information about this and other overloads of the `Round` method, see the <xref:System.Math.Round%2A> reference page.
trans-unit.target: 如範例和完整的使用方式資訊有關這個主題以及其他多載`Round`方法，請參閱<xref:System.Math.Round%2A>參考頁面。

trans-unit.source: The result is outside the range of a <see cref="T:System.Decimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 結果位於 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 的範圍之外。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point number to be rounded.
trans-unit.target: 要四捨五入的雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.source: Rounds a double-precision floating-point value to the nearest integral value.
trans-unit.target: 將雙精確度浮點數四捨五入為最接近的整數值。

trans-unit.source: The integer nearest <paramref name="a" />.
trans-unit.target: 最接近 <paramref name="a" /> 的整數。

trans-unit.source: If the fractional component of <paramref name="a" /> is halfway between two integers, one of which is even and the other odd, then the even number is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="a" /> 的小數部分正好為兩個整數的中間數 (一個為偶數，另一個為奇數)，則會傳回偶數。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method returns a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> instead of an integral type.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這個方法會傳回 <see cref="T:System.Double" />，而不是整數類型。

trans-unit.source: For examples and comprehensive usage information about this and other overloads of the `Round` method, see the <xref:System.Math.Round%2A> reference page.
trans-unit.target: 如範例和完整的使用方式資訊有關這個主題以及其他多載`Round`方法，請參閱<xref:System.Math.Round%2A>參考頁面。

trans-unit.source: Because of the loss of precision that can result from representing decimal values as floating-point numbers or performing arithmetic operations on floating-point values, in some cases the <see cref="M:System.Math.Round(System.Double)" /> method may not appear to round midpoint values to the nearest even integer.
trans-unit.target: 因為可能會造成無法表示為浮點數的數字的十進位值，或在某些情況下執行浮點數值、 算術運算的有效位數遺失<see cref="M:System.Math.Round(System.Double)" />方法可能不會出現要捨入到中點值接近的偶數整數。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, because the floating-point value .1 has no finite binary representation, the first call to the <see cref="M:System.Math.Round(System.Double)" /> method with a value of 11.5 returns 11 instead of 12.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，因為浮點值.1 有沒有有限的二進位表示法，第一次呼叫<see cref="M:System.Math.Round(System.Double)" />11.5 值的方法會傳回 11，而不是 12。

trans-unit.target: 指定如果 <c>d</c> 介於另外兩個數字中間的四捨五入法。

trans-unit.source: Rounds a decimal value to the nearest integer.
trans-unit.target: 將十進位值四捨五入為最接近的整數。

trans-unit.target: 如果值介於兩個數字之間，參數會指定如何四捨五入該值。

trans-unit.target: 傳回值中小數點後數字的數目。

trans-unit.source: Rounds a double-precision floating-point value to a specified number of fractional digits.
trans-unit.target: 將雙精確度浮點值四捨五入為指定的小數位數。

trans-unit.source: The number nearest to <paramref name="value" /> that contains a number of fractional digits equal to <paramref name="digits" />.
trans-unit.target: 最接近 <paramref name="value" /> 的數字，其中包含等於 <paramref name="digits" /> 的小數位數。

trans-unit.source: For examples and comprehensive usage information about this and other overloads of the `Round` method, see the <xref:System.Math.Round%2A> reference page.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="digits" /> is less than 0 or greater than 15.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="digits" /> 小於 0 或大於 15。

trans-unit.source: Because of the loss of precision that can result from representing decimal values as floating-point numbers or performing arithmetic operations on floating-point values, in some cases the <see cref="M:System.Math.Round(System.Double,System.Int32)" /> method may not appear to round midpoint values to the nearest even value in the <paramref name="digits" /> decimal position.
trans-unit.target: 因為可能會造成無法表示為浮點數的數字的十進位值，或在某些情況下執行浮點數值、 算術運算的有效位數遺失<see cref="M:System.Math.Round(System.Double,System.Int32)" />方法可能不會出現要捨入到中點值最接近的偶數值<paramref name="digits" />小數點的位置。

trans-unit.source: This is illustrated in the following example, where 2.135 is rounded to 2.13 instead of 2.14.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例中，其中 2.135 會捨入到而不是 2.14 2.13 所示。

trans-unit.source: This occurs because internally the method multiplies <paramref name="value" /> by 10<sup>digits</sup>, and the multiplication operation in this case suffers from a loss of precision.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為內部方法乘以<paramref name="value" />10<sup>位數</sup>，和乘法運算在此情況下會受到遺失有效位數。

trans-unit.source: An angle, measured in radians.
trans-unit.target: 以弧度為單位的角度。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sine of the specified angle.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定角的正弦函數。

trans-unit.source: The sine of <paramref name="a" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="a" />的正弦函數。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="a" /> is equal to <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" />, or <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />, this method returns <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="a" /> 等於 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />、<see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />，則這個方法會傳回 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />。

trans-unit.source: The angle, `a`, must be in radians.
trans-unit.target: 旋轉的角度， `a`，必須是弧度。

trans-unit.source: Multiply by <xref:System.Math.PI?displayProperty=nameWithType>/180 to convert degrees to radians.
trans-unit.target: Multiply 由 <xref:System.Math.PI?displayProperty=nameWithType> /180 度轉換為弧度。

trans-unit.source: Acceptable values of `a` range from approximately -9223372036854775295 to approximately 9223372036854775295.
For values outside of this range, the <xref:System.Math.Sin%2A> method returns `a` unchanged rather than throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 值超出此範圍，<xref:System.Math.Sin%2A>方法會傳回`a`不變，而不是擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses <xref:System.Math.Sin%2A> to evaluate certain trigonometric identities for selected angles.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Math.Sin%2A>評估某些選取的角度的三角身分識別。

trans-unit.source: An angle, measured in radians.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hyperbolic sine of the specified angle.

trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 等於 <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" />、<see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />，則這個方法會傳回等於 <paramref name="value" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Double" />。

trans-unit.target: Multiply 由 <xref:System.Math.PI?displayProperty=nameWithType> /180 度轉換為弧度。

trans-unit.source: The square root of the area of a square represents the length of any side of the square.
trans-unit.target: 方格區域的平方根表示的長度平方的任一邊。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the area of some cities in the United States and gives an impression of each city's size if it were represented by a square.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例的部分城市的區域顯示在美國境內，並提供每個城市大小的印象，如果它已由正方形。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to calculate the tangent of an angle and display it to the console.

trans-unit.source: An angle, measured in radians.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hyperbolic tangent of the specified angle.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the integral part of a number.
trans-unit.target: 計算數字的整數部分。

trans-unit.source: The number is rounded to the nearest integer towards zero.
trans-unit.target: 數字會四捨五入為最接近的整數推向零。

trans-unit.source: A number to truncate.
trans-unit.target: 要截斷的數字。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the integral part of a specified decimal number.
trans-unit.target: 計算指定的十進位數字的整數部分。

trans-unit.source: The integral part of <paramref name="d" />; that is, the number that remains after any fractional digits have been discarded.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="d" /> 的整數部分；換言之，捨棄所有小數點後的數字。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Math.Truncate%2A> rounds `d` to the nearest integer towards zero.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Math.Truncate%2A> 捨入`d`為最接近的整數推向零。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Math.Truncate%28System.Decimal%29> method to truncate both a positive and a negative <xref:System.Decimal> value.

trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term><paramref name="d" /></term><description> 傳回值

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Math.Truncate%2A> rounds `d` to the nearest integer towards zero.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Math.Truncate%2A> 捨入`d`為最接近的整數推向零。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Math.Truncate%28System.Double%29> method to truncate both a positive and a negative <xref:System.Double> value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會呼叫<xref:System.Math.Truncate%28System.Double%29>截斷正數或負數方法<xref:System.Double>值。
